name: Dragon's Breath
description: You touch one willing creature, and choose Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison. Until the spell ends, the target can take a Magic action to exhale a 15-foot Cone. Each creature in that area makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 3d6 damage of the chosen type on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

subsequentTurnAction.description: The target can take a Magic action to exhale a 15-foot Cone. Each creature in the area makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 3d6 damage of the chosen type on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

scaling.description: The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 2.
